data.text: @1AllanJennings Sir, we believe our customer experience team is in touch with you. We request you to check and revert to the same trailing mail for further assistance.~ Nandita

@ChattarajMegh Ma'am, we are concerned to hear this. Rude behavior is not at all accepted. We request you to share your PNR via DM so stern feedback can be shared with the concerned team for further review. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @MallickAmad Sir, we request you to visit https://t.co/ygt0L5pF2V to check on the same and let us know via DM if the issue still persists. ~Ojasvi
@JayaKum60189562 Ma'am, we understand how frustrating this can be. We have raised this with the concerned team and will get back to you with an update at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@Sanskar37457242 Sir, thank you for your kind words. We are glad to know that our team could assist you well. Hope to see you on a 6E flight again soon.~ Nandita

@ashishhh2004 Sir, please know that the check-in counter closes 60 mins and the boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to the departure. Further, we request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@HarshitSikka9 Sir, we request you to share the 7-digit case reference number via DM so, we may expedite the process.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@FounderJha Sir, thank you for your time on the call. We believe our team was able to assist you regarding the concern.  ~Kritika
@HAOOOLLAAAA Hi, we regret the inconvenience. We request you to allow us some time. We are getting this checked with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita
@bewkufaamaadmi Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Further, we've replied to your DM and we are sharing the feedback with the concerned team for further review. ~Ojasvi

@PallaviSinghTDG Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused. We never intend to disrupt the plans of our passengers. We request you to share your contact number via DM so we can connect with you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@Amarend37924153 Mr Kumar, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we may share your feedback with the concerned team. ~Ojasvi

@Silly2K Ma'am, the 'Auto-Assign' option comes before this screen, right next to the selected seat option. Instead of the 'select seats' option, you have to click on 'check-in through auto assigned seat'. ~Ojasvi
@moll_ste Hi, we have replied to you via DM. Please check.~ Nandita

@Silly2K Hi, we are concerned to see this. Free seats are subject to availability as the same is limited in inventory. You may opt for auto-assigned seats during web check-in. Further, please share the PNR via DM If the issue still persists. ~Ojasvi

@trivedidhawal07 Hi, thank you for the warm words. We are glad our team could assist you and make your travel experience with us smooth and hassle-free. We are sharing your kudos right away. :) ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@sandesh_65 Hi, we are concerned to hear this. Please help us with the PNR via DM so we may look into this further. ~Ojasvi

@manit_garg19 Mr Garg, we never wish to disrupt the plans of our passengers. The delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft. Further, we are sharing your feedback with the concerned team for further review. ~Ojasvi
@sheik0395 Sir, we regret to see this. Please share your PNR and complaint acknowledgment copy(PIR) via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text: @rajnikat Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused. We always advise our passengers to pre-book their meals before they travel. Further, we request you to share your PNR via DM so we may share your feedback with the concerned team. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi
@triptoes We'd like to assure you that our customers' possessions are our priority and they are handled with utmost care. ~Kritika 2/2

@triptoes Ms Goel, thank you for your feedback. The boxes in the video shared are not customers' luggage but instead, these are fast-moving, light weight containers carrying non-fragile cargo and packed by the shippers for us to endure fast maneuvers. 1/2
@aashishsoni1111 Mr Soni, we are concerned to hear this. We request you to share your PNR via DM so may look into this further. ~Ojasvi
@Hbatra2389 Hi, we've replied to your DM. Further, we are raising this with the concerned team and appreciate your patience during this interim. ~Ojasvi

data.text: @SagarDuklan Sir. if the visa has been issued with more than one name or the father's/family name is mentioned on the second page. Customers will be accepted. You may also visit https://t.co/o9sWZe4v8U for more information.~ Nandita

urls.title: Baggage Allowance, IndiGo Baggage Allowance | IndiGo
urls.description: Get the detailed information on Indigo baggage allowance for your all domestic flights as well as international flights. Know the number and weight of baggage prices you are allowed to carry during your journey.

data.text: @javedkh34759807 Sir, please be informed that only 1 handbag is allowed of up to 7 kg. Please visit https://t.co/qHYQwbubKQ for detailed info on the same.~Vaishali
@PathikAlmoula Mr Almoula, we're concerned to note your disappointment. Could you please share the details with us via DM? We wish to connect with you in this regard.~Vaishali
@Mark_Rodricks Sure, Sir. We will connect with you soon.~Vaishali

@DatyeSwati Hi, please know that the charges are there for advance seat selection. If you do not have a seat preference, you may opt for an auto-seat assignment up to 6 hours prior to the departure which is free of cost.~Vaishali
@AlokCha62493787 Hi, we request you to share the screenshot of the error via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali

@bharatvajaria Sir, we regret such an experience. We try our best to fly on time, however, sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. We sincerely hope to serve you better in the future. ~Vaishali
@Mark_Rodricks Sir, could you please share a suitable time to connect with you for assistance? Thank you.~Vaishali
@28nikhilgoyal Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali
@affyme786 Sir, thank you for your kind words. We're glad to know that our team assisted you well. We wish you a speedy recovery and hope to see you on board again soon.~Vaishali #goIndiGo

@vijaybs74748341 Thanks for taking the time to speak with us, Mr Singh. We once again regret the experience you had and have duly noted your feedback to avoid any re-occurrence in the future. Looking forward to serving you better, next time you travel with us. ~Navi
@milan7p Yes Mr Parikh. If it's a Battery Operated Device, please carry the batteries in your Hand Luggage. ~Navi
@milankumarsing1 We believe the baggage has been delivered to you. Sincere apologies for the trouble. ~Shreya
@_Sudipa_B We believe you have collected your baggage from the airport today. Thanks! ~Shreya
@milan7p You're most welcome. 😊 ~Navi
@sandymishra1505 Mr Mishra, we request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can take a look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@milan7p Mr Parikh, we request you to carry the Carvaan Radio in your Check-In Luggage. Looking forward to having you onboard. ~Navi

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @mfhussain25 Sir, we request you to visit https://t.co/58PvLAZ8E3 to complete the Web Check-In and to generate the Boarding Passes. Please don't change the assigned seats and let us know in case you face any issues. ~Navi
@sapra_shubham We are glad to be able to assist, Sir. ~Yashica
@dsguru1988 We are concerned to note this, what happened, Sir? Please DM us your PNR so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@nava_bannerjee Mr Bannerjee, we never wish to disrupt the travel plans of our customers and regret your experience. Could you please share your PNR with us over DM so we can look into this further? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@anantIIMi Mr Saxena, we regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number so we may assist you on priority. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@sapra_shubham Mr Sapra, we believe one of our representatives got in touch with you to assist. Do let us know in case you need more assistance and we wish you a great day. ~Navi

@SunamikaSingh Ms Singh, we regret the experience and will surely check on the same with our Concerned Team. Your feedback is well noted and we wish to serve you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi
@mat2365998125 Hi, we are looking into this and appreciate your patience during this interim. ~Yashica
@3nitinj Mr Jain, we have informed our Airport Team about the same and request you to get in touch with them for real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi

urls.description: Find all essential information on COVID-19 state-wise regulations and know more about different state governments that have laid out their respective protocols for passengers arriving at their airports.

data.text: @Kuldeep32257988 Mr Mishra, a valid ticket and ID Proof will be sufficient. Rest, you may visit https://t.co/DCmzLOCFvM to check the State Wise Guidelines. Thanks. ~Navi

@HariKri99251448 Mr Krishna, we regret the inconvenience and request you to share your concern in detail along with your PNR and Contact Number via DM, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text: @47_lokesh @chaptersindigo For a career with us, we always recommend visiting our website at https://t.co/wovzjBTuQ3. ~Shreya 2/2

@47_lokesh @chaptersindigo Sir, please be cautioned that certain people claiming to represent IndiGo- by misusing the brand name 'IndiGo', and the name of our employees. We'd like to clarify that IndiGo never charges any fees for conducting interviews. 1/2
